question: How can computer vision systems detect manufacturing defects in real-time under varying lighting and production conditions?
motivation: Manual quality inspection is slow and inconsistent. Developing robust vision systems that work reliably in industrial settings could improve product quality while reducing inspection costs.

question: What reinforcement learning approaches can optimize multi-stage manufacturing processes with complex interdependencies?
motivation: Manufacturing optimization involves cascading decisions across production stages. Creating RL agents that learn optimal control policies could significantly improve efficiency and reduce waste.
